snippet: Wincing and clutching his shins, Riddick Bowe ended his debut in Thai kickboxing with a thud in the second round in Pattaya, Thailand.
abstract: Levgen Golovin defeats former boxing champion Riddick Bowe in second round of his Thai kickboxing debut.
lead_paragraph: Wincing and clutching his shins, Riddick Bowe ended his debut in Thai kickboxing with a thud in the second round in Pattaya, Thailand.

headline.main: Riddick Bowe Has Painful Kickboxing Debut
